name: A. Life Without Zeros
statement:
Can you imagine our life if we removed all zeros from it? For sure we
will have many problems.In this problem we will have a simple example if
we removed all zeros from our life, it’s the addition operation. Let’s
assume you are given this equation , where and are positive integers,
and is the sum of and . Now let’s remove all zeros from this equation.
Will the equation remain correct after removing all zeros?For example if
the equation is , if we removed all zeros it will be which is still a
correct equation.But if the equation is , if we removed all zeros it
will be which is not a correct equation.
editorial:
In this problem you need to do what is written in the statement. You can do it in the following 3 steps:
1- Calculate C.
2- Remove all zeros from A, B and C.
3- Check if the new values form a correct equation.
